div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: We want you to be assured that we are here for you in these challenging times. That includes providing school meals to all students during the ordered school-building closure period.
div.h2:
Food will be provided at our location:
1400 Oak Hill Avenue
Youngstown, OH 44507
div.p: Meal Deliveries will occur every Tuesday during the closure starting March 23, 2020.
Pick up will be in the school parking lot, please remain in your vehicles and your meals will be brought to your car.
div.h2:
Pick Up Times are:
Tuesday: 11:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m.
div.p: Five days-worth of meals will be provided for both Breakfast and Lunch for any student, including milk. Meals can be refrigerated and/or reheated, as needed.

div.class: sqs-layout sqs-grid-12 columns-12 Footer-blocks Footer-blocks--top sqs-alternate-block-style-container
sqs-block button-block sqs-block-button sqs-col-6 span-6 float float-right

div.p: Come in for a tour of our building or give us a call at 330-774-5562, weekdays between 8:30 am and 4:00 pm we cant wait to see you!
